activities: Bridgeline Digital develops website applications for our customers on top of our web engagement management software (iAPPS). We then host these custom websites on behalf of our customers. Bridgeline Digital does not directly collect information from users of Customer Websites. All such information is collected by Customers or on behalf of Customers by parties other than Bridgeline Digital. We host in a SSAE16 compliant data center, our software is PA-DSS compliant and we offer a PCI-certified infrastructure as well. We employ an IT team also tasked with security monitoring.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data submitted through websites hosted by Bridgeline (but managed by the data owner themselves).
privacyprograms: We are PCI-DSS and PA-DSS certified.
